EmailTemplate.name: DND-EN.DNA-Email-1-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy +DND
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I’m Ed Jackson, your dedicated Grand & Toy account representative. We’ve been serving the Department of National Defence for decades, providing workplace innovation products that enable you to be your productive best. We also hold multiple Standing Offers and Supply Arrangements across various product categories.
We know it’s a pain when you run out of the tools you need to perform your job, so we’ve set up a customized landing page for our DND customers. Check it out now <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/DND-BUYERS-EN.html?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> to see:
- PSPC approved Standing Offer products - Tips and tricks to make procurement easier - Custom links to provide direct access to account specialists, budget monitoring and recurring order programs
Your department deserves the best and I’m here to help.
Let’s get started! <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/DND-BUYERS-EN.html?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
P.S. If this email is not applicable to your role, can you please forward it to the appropriate person in your department?
Best,
Ed Jackson Government Account Manager, Public Sector
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON, L4L 9C7 E-mail: edjackson@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:edjackson@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 416-434-0944
Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Gov?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
